EmailTemplate.description: To send to an Agent his CASSlink Stock Access
EmailTemplate.name: CH-EN CASSLINK STOCK ACCESS CONFIRMATION
EmailTemplate.subject: AWB stock request: Your CASSLink access.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
It is our pleasure to communicate you your CASSlink-Stock Management access. This access will allow you to order AWB stocks to our participating airlines, 24 hours a day :
https://casslink.iata.org User Name: Password :
A Userâ€™s manual is available at www.iata.org/europe/cs (Document & Form Centre / Cargo Agent).
For your information, each carrier has to configurate your account. You might have to contact them before placing your first order.
NEW! --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- IATA now offers you the possibility to order neutral AWB forms for only: 0.30 USD per form or 0.28 USD per form when more than 1000 per order (discount shown when checking out).
Our fares are door-to-door, delivered aproximately 1 week after the payment date. We do accept credit cards.
Visit us here or at www.iataonline.com and search "AWB" --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- --- -- ---- --- --- --- --- --
Should you need any further information from IATA, please do not hesitate to login a new query via our Customer Portal: www.iata.org/europe/cs. These queries will be answered with the highest priority.
Yours sincerely,
{!Case.OwnerFullName} Service Centre Europe International Air Transport Association www.iata.org/europe/cs
